name: Bengal Tiger
info: The Bengal tiger is a population of the Panthera tigris tigris subspecies native to the Indian subcontinent. It is the largest of all wild cats and is known for its powerful build and striking orange coat with black stripes.

name: Emperor Penguin
info: The emperor penguin is the tallest and heaviest of all living penguin species and is endemic to Antarctica. They are famous for their incredible journey across the ice to breed and raise their chicks in the harsh winter.

name: Giant Panda
info: Native to south-central China, the giant panda is easily recognized by its bold black-and-white coat and rotund body. Though technically carnivores, their diet consists almost entirely of bamboo.
